quote: My eyes! The goggles do nothing!
author: -Radioactive Man

quote: Hello, Simpson. I'm riding the bus today becuase Mother hid my car keys to punish me for talking to a woman on the phone. She was right to do it.
author: -Principal Skinner

quote: I live in a single room above a bowling alley...and below another bowling alley.
author: -Frank Grimes

quote: All I'm gonna use this bed for is sleeping, eating and maybe building a little fort.
author: -Homer Simpson

quote: In theory, Communism works! In theory.
author: -Homer Simpson

quote: Oh, wow, windows. I don't think I could afford this place.
author: -Otto

quote: Remember the time he ate my goldfish? And you lied and said I never had a goldfish. Then why did I have the bowl, Bart? Why did I have the bowl?
author: -Milhouse Van Houten

quote: Shoplifting is a victimless crime, like punching someone in the dark.
author: -Nelson Muntz

quote: Ah, be creative. Instead of making sandwhiches with bread, use Pop-Tarts. Instead of chewing gum, chew bacon.
author: -Dr. Nick

quote: I can't even say the word 'titmouse' without gigggling like a schoolgirl.
author: -Homer Simpson

quote: You're turning me into a criminal when all I want to be is a petty thug.
author: -Bart Simpson

quote: Why are you pleople avoiding me? Does my withered face remind you of the grim specter of death?
author: -Abe Simpson

quote: Last night's 'Itchy and Scratchy' was, without a doubt, the worst episode ever. Rest assured that I was on the Internet within minutes, registering my disgust throughout the world.
author: -Comicbook Guy

quote: Hey, I'm the chief here. Bake him away, toys.
author: -Chief Wiggum

quote: Ahh! Sweet liquor eases the pain.
author: -Troy McClure

quote: These are my only friends...grown-up nerds like Gore Vidal. And even he's kissed more boys than I ever will.
author: -Lisa Simpson

quote: I don't want to sound like a killjoy, but becuase this is not to my taste I don't think anyone else should be allowed to enjoy it.
author: -Marge Simpson
